Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/4/1985, off Tom Gorman (NYM)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,450,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Philadelphia to Oakland on 8/1/1988 (Going to PHI: P Todd Burns. Going to OAK: P Marty Clary, 2B Juan Samuel)...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/3/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Released by San Diego on 10/30/1989...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/3/1990 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 8/31/1991 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
6/9/1992: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $2,550,000 per year, for 2 years.
